snippet.title: Scooby Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade - iOS / Android - HD Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Scooby Doo! & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade by Warner Bros. (iOS / Android)

Step right up to the Scooby Doo & Looney Tunes Cartoon Universe: Arcade! Choose from ten fun mini-games based on these iconic cartoon worlds, each with multiple levels and increasingly difficult challenges. As you play, earn coins that can be used to unlock other games in the arcade or customize your character with special outfits, abilities and weapons.

iTunes Store Page:

https://itunes.apple.com/nz/app/scooby-doo!-looney-tunes-cartoon/id876506250

Google Play:

TBA

Homepage:

TBA
